name: welcome
description: Welcome users to Atom-ng with useful information

showOnStartup.description: Show welcome panes with useful information when opening a new Atom-ng window.

showTelemetryConsent.description: Show telemetry consent pane when opening a new Atom-ng window. Always false.

showSunsettingOnStartup.description: Show sunsetting pane when opening a new Atom-ng window. Always false.
